titleStmt.title: Christendom; or, The nature of Christ's kingdom opened, and the chiefest difficulties in divinity cleared in order to ending the controversies among Christian philosophers, scool-men [sic], and divines of all parties.

notesStmt.note: First two leaves contain t.-p. (reverse blank) and preface.
Imperfect: staining with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Libray of Scotland.
